name: Bert 2
description:
Bert is having a nightmare!
Help the teddy bear "Bert" survive while honey jars keep invading the house!

As the honey jars keep coming you might want to rebuild the 3 barriers located in the house, as this will keep the honey jars out for a while! 
---
Once you get enough money you can start buying new weapons! There are currently 3 weapons in the game for you to discover!
---
To help Bert survive you can also find power-ups from time to time! There are currently 4 power-ups in the game for you to discover! 

FOR HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE?
